titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that members of the uniformed services and the Foreign Service shall be treated as using a principal residence while on official extended duty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/14/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that members of the uniformed services and the Foreign Service shall be treated as using a principal residence while on official extended duty.
